title: Achieved performances of this paper
summary: The paper presents significant achievements in AI, including a 20.5% accuracy boost on ImageSquawk at CVPR 2022, a reduction in GPU memory usage by over 300x, 20x faster processing speeds compared to state-of-the-art methods, and the first work to achieve lossless compression of CIFAR-100 on a single NVIDIA 2080 Ti GPU using only 2.3 GB of memory.
